on the email. Both emails makes it easier.

6 Bedrooms
4 bathrooms (3 private & 1 shared)
Can be rented individually (by room) or as a group
House has two seperate locakable entrances that can be separated to allow more privacy
Stackable laundry in house

Comes furnished if desired - all new furnishings - Bed - 2 night stands - desk 

Great community. Both individual rooms and shares are available. We are looking for long term renters as well.

Complete and tasteful full house renovation (2016 craftsman in a Great 100 year old neighborhood 3 minute walk to Ashby BART, Berkeley Bowl, 5 Cafe's, playhouse, library, tools library, Biodiesel station, 3 parks and more.

This is a clean, non cluttered house. 

One of the biggest draws is our proximity to the closest BART station to San Francisco in Berkeley (1100 feet - 4 minute walk). There are only 3 stops before you get to the first stop in SF (Embarcadero). It takes 18 minutes to get to San Francisco. You literally DON'T need a car. You can walk or bike to Berkeley Bowl (Berkeley equivalent to Whole Foods but better prices and fruit / veggie selection), Walgreens, 5 cafes, 3 corner stores, art galleries and much more. You are literally in the "center" of Berkeley (from our perspective).

The house was completely renovated from Oct 15-Jan 16 (last month):
BEDROOMS: See below for detailed explanation. ALL PILLOWS AND DOWN COMFORTERS AND OF COURSE SHEETS ARE WASHED BEFORE A NEW PARTY ARRIVES
PLUMBING: New on demand water heater and plumbing (great pressure) to allow all 4 bathrooms, the dishwasher and washing machine to run at once with unlimited hot water. You can literally take a 2 hour shower if you want
4 SHOWERS: Granite and tile 
KITCHEN: Brand new kitchen with 8 foot slider to awesome deck leading to backyard. All new high end appliances, 5 burner stove, dishwasher, microwave, sink, fridge and large stackable washer dryer
WHOLE HOUSE INSIDE AND OUTSIDE:: Painted 2 weeks ago, brand new double paned windows, digital entry locks (reset for each guest). Large stackable washer dryer in unit on main floor.
BACKYARD: Bonfire. Huge back yard with brand new 9 foot redwood fence / bamboo surrounding property and organic vegetable garden you can eat from. Water fountain. Teak tables with heat lamps and umbrellas to seat 16 if needed. High chairs and boosters included
INGROUND HOT TUB: will be complete may 15


NEIGHBORS: We live next door in a 3 story craftsman and are the most chill family you'll ever meet - if you decide you want to :) We are not nosy - you'll probably never see us. We don't care if you have parties (no keg stands), there is no curfew (the area has huge lots so no one cares if you make a little noise or have a bonfire. We are one of the neighbors and the other side are the most mellow people in the world.

The lower floor also has 2 large bedrooms and another full bathroom. The first floor has refinished hardwood floors, and the lower floor has a ceramic tile floor. There is a washer/dryer. 

The apartment is located in a quiet neighborhood between UCB and the shops of North Berkeley. The campus is just a few blocks away, as are the popular shops and restaurants of north Shattuck. listings.description:
Welcome To Higby

Built In 2015.

A refined living experience in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley. With modern apartments and inviting common areas, Higby creates a place that is both home and a gathering space. Within walking distance to craft breweries, celebrated restaurants, organic markets and cultural highlights, Higby celebrated exploration and adventure. 

Higby offers studio, one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley

Modern building amenities include: 
•	Lobby with lounge seating and TV
•	Courtyard with a bocce ball court
•	Roof deck with a barbecue, fire pit, lounge seating and city views
•	Fitness studio
•	Indoor bike storage and work stand
•	Enclosed residential parking garage

Apartment units feature: 
•	Electric ovens
•	Gas range cooktops
•	Dishwashers
•	Washers and dryers

Higby is designed to operate 25% more efficiently than a code-compliant building. Sustainability highlights contributing to Higby's LEED Gold certification include:
•	Locally sourced and recycle content materials
•	Non-toxic finishes and a building-wide green cleaning program
•	Aggressive construction waste recycling program
•	Native, adaptive plantings to reduce water consumption
•	On-site planters to detain and manage storm water 

So Stretch out. Entertain. Sleep it off. Celebrate pajama day. Declare a lost weekend. Take a conference call from home. Do what you do. Live At Higby.


Office Hours
Monday 9am - 6pm
Tuesday 9am - 6pm
Wednesday 9am - 6pm
Thursday 9am - 6pm
Friday 9am - 6pm
Saturday 10am - 5pm
Sunday 10am - 5pm

3015 SAN PABLO AVE, Berkeley, CA 94702

listings.description:
Welcome To Higby

Built In 2015.

A refined living experience in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley. With modern apartments and inviting common areas, Higby creates a place that is both home and a gathering space. Within walking distance to craft breweries, celebrated restaurants, organic markets and cultural highlights, Higby celebrated exploration and adventure. 

Higby offers studio, one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley

Modern building amenities include: 
•	Lobby with lounge seating and TV
•	Courtyard with a bocce ball court
•	Roof deck with a barbecue, fire pit, lounge seating and city views
•	Fitness studio
•	Indoor bike storage and work stand
•	Enclosed residential parking garage

Apartment units feature: 
•	Electric ovens
•	Gas range cooktops
•	Dishwashers
•	Washers and dryers

Higby is designed to operate 25% more efficiently than a code-compliant building. Sustainability highlights contributing to Higby's LEED Gold certification include:
•	Locally sourced and recycle content materials
•	Non-toxic finishes and a building-wide green cleaning program
•	Aggressive construction waste recycling program
•	Native, adaptive plantings to reduce water consumption
•	On-site planters to detain and manage storm water 

So Stretch out. Entertain. Sleep it off. Celebrate pajama day. Declare a lost weekend. Take a conference call from home. Do what you do. Live At Higby.

Tuesday 9am - 6pm

Sunday 10am - 5pm

listings.description:
MODERN AND SPACIOUS WEST END COMMONS LOFT-STYLE TOWNHOME

Building: West End Commons
Neighborhood: Clausen
Bedrooms: 1 BR + Den
Bathrooms: 1 BA
Style: Townhouse
Parking: Deeded
Square Feet: 965
Security Deposit: 1.5 Months
Lease Term: 1 Year
Must Provide Credit Report and Income/Employment Verification, Good Credit Required

This 2-level detached townhouse has no shared walls and no neighbors above or below. High ceiling heights, modern architectural elements, and expansive windows and skylight give this 1 bedroom plus den, 1 bathroom unit, an abundance of natural light.

This loft-style home is spacious, with an open living, dining, and work space. A beautiful open kitchen offers granite countertops, bamboo cabinetry, and top-of-the-line stainless steel Bosch appliances including a refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, gas oven/range, Nest Thermostat, and garbage disposal. The straight staircase leads to the spacious second floor with one bedroom, a large walk-in closet, a den, and a good-sized bathroom with 2 wall-mounted Duravit sinks + custom built vanities, a tiled shower/bathtub, and high-grade lighting fixtures.

Designed by the award-winning firm David Baker + Partners, the individual townhouses at West End Commons combine the functional and stylish aspects of a loft with more traditional aspects of home design. Large open floor plans are paired with well-appointed kitchens and bathrooms as well as more secluded sleeping areas on the upper floors. Each of the townhouses opens on to 1 of 5 lanes. Lined with pavers, lit by streetlights, and landscaped with trees, vines, and grasses, the lanes create an intimate retreat that was inspired by classic urban neighborhoods such as Brooklyn Heights, London's Islington, and Boston's North End. A path leading through shared green space provides an inviting place to wander or meet up with friends, neighbors, or clients.

Located in Oakland's West Clawson neighborhood just 2 blocks south of Emeryville, the development has easy access to all of Emeryville's shops, eateries, grocery stores, and entertainment.

Unit Features:

• 1 bedroom plus den, 1 bathroom bi-level detached townhouse
• 965 sq. ft. 
• High ceilings
• Kitchen features stainless steel Bosch appliances
• Polished concrete floors on first floor, carpet on second floor
• Bathroom with Duravit sinks, subway tiled shower/bathtub, and high-grade lighting fixtures
• Track lighting
• Stackable Bosch washer/dryer in unit
• Central heat and tankless water heater
• Secure parking space right in front of unit
• Pets will be considered on an individual basis

Complex Features:

• Controlled-access intercom/telephone entry system
• Beautifully landscaped including small green park with picnic table
• San Francisco Bay Trail soon to open right in front of complex, connecting you to a variety of hiking, bikin,g and jogging paths that will stretch for 400 miles throughout the Bay Area
• Close to Brown Sugar Kitchen and Kilovolt Coffee
• Easy access to Bay Bridge, Downtown Oakland BART, Jack London Square, Rockridge, Berkeley, and all major freeways
• Short walk to EmeryGoRound Free Shuttle w/ Service to BART, Bay Street Shopping and Emeryville Marina / AC Transit

Rental Rates continue rising in SF. Come to sunny Emeryville!!!
Andante Condominiums
1121 40th Street, Emeryville

ABOUT THE UNIT
This unit is located on the 2nd floor facing adaline st and garden. Very well detailed unit with 1 bedroom and 1 full bath. Bright, airy open kitchen and dining room combination with living room area and deck. Excellent exposure to afternoon summer sun. All modern stainless appliance upgrades too. Includes dishwasher, granite countertop, refrigerator, microwave, wood floor, carpet. Parking space included. Approximately 625 square foot unit.

ABOUT THE LOCATION
Andante is located at a premiere corner of Emeryville, at the intersection of San Pablo Ave, 40th and Adeline Streets. Andante is close to Bay Area transportation, Bay Bridge, University of California Berkeley, downtown Oakland, walking distance to many Emeryville's jobs, including Chiron and Pixar Studios. Excellent public transportation to BART, AC Transit to downtown Oakland and San Francisco.

ABOUT THE BUILDING
The Andante is a 125-unit condominium development on 1.83 acres of land in the heart of Emeryville. It is located on the site of the King Midas Card Club, which closed in 1998.
This mixed-use building was designed by HDO Architect Planners, developed by SNK Development and completed in 2005. Amenities include gated secured entry, a fitness center, spa, elevators to all residential levels, private open space/courtyard with seating area and parking for 263 cars. There is 15,000 square feet of ground floor commercial space consisting of restaurants and retail stores.
One- bedroom floor plans at the Andante include sound-controlled walls and floors, granite countertops, laminated wood flooring in the entry and kitchen, ceramic tile flooring in the bathroom, birch and cherry laminated cabinets with satin chrome pulls and an 8-inch-deep dual stainless steel sink. Unit offers upgraded plumbing fixtures, including a Kohler pull-spray kitchen faucet, walk-in closets with shelving, private outdoor space and abundant natural light.

For more information, contact Fred Vaghar at

listings.description:
Beautifully remodeled 4-5 BR Home in North Berkeley is complete, and available now for unfurnished rental at a discounted rent as we put the finishing touches on the exterior and gardens. Location is just up the hill, roughly a 5-6 block walk from the pleasures of Solano Avenue's neighborhood commercial district. The approx. 100-year-old home has been tastefully remodeled to architect specifications, honoring its original architectural style.

This Brown Shingle home of approx 2500 s.f. features: Drop-dead 3-bridge and Bay views from generous-sized Master Suite with separate tub + shower and twin sinks. Three other BR's on this level with a shared 2nd bathroom and laundry room. Sunny large Basement level family room has its own entrance and private bath and additional laundry and could be used as a 5th BR. 

Middle floor has light-filled large Living room with woodburning fireplace and bookshelves, gracious entry Hall, Powder Room and Formal Dining room all with lovely wood accents. Spacious remodeled Kitchen with stainless higher end appliances, has walk-out deck access facing very large back yard, with lemon and fig trees and plenty of undomesticated lawn to run around in. 

Parking is available in the driveway for 2 cars, plus more street parking a half block away. 
One cat permitted, additional cats at additional charge.

Financial Details:
Full rent amount: $6200 per month. Tenant to pay for PGE, Cable/phone, Garbage, Water.
Discounted rent amount, beginning immediately will be $1000 per month discount from the full amount, refunded each month following payment of full rent amount. Written month-to-month rental agreement required. Good credit/income required. 
Payment of move-in costs by cashiers or bank check only.
Payment of monthly rent via EFT or other money transfer only. 
Move-in costs: Balance of first month (if you don't move in on the first) plus 2 months additional to be held as security/damage/last month's. 

Available now.

listings.description: Beautiful fully furnished 2 bedroom, 2 bath house (1100 square feet) with living room, dining room, eat in kitchen, small office, laundry, garage, deck and beautiful backyard with grassy area, fruit trees, and vegetable garden. House is light, quiet, and spacious with all amenities including wireless internet. House is fully furnished, rental includes all linens, kitchen equipment, etc. Bedrooms each have their own bathroom; both bedrooms have queen size beds. House is located 1 mile from the UC Berkeley campus in a quiet residential neighborhood of South Berkeley. The house is 3 blocks to the Ashby BART station and walkable to the university, downtown, Elmwood, shops, restaurants, and 2 excellent grocery stores. I own the house, teach at UC Berkeley, and will be away this summer (approximately mid June to mid August, some flexibility of dates possible). I currently have a small dog (who will be with me) and two chickens (who lay fresh eggs daily). The dog will be with me this summer and the chickens can either stay and lay eggs for you, or I can send them to a neighbor. The house has a dog door and I am open to your well-behaved and non destructive small dog. Rent is $3500/month including all utilities and cleaning. 1 month minimum, but prefer someone interested in the full 2 month period. Please include a little information about yourself, your dates, and why you are looking for a rental.

listings.description:
LUXURY RESTORED ELMWOOD EDWARDIAN STUDIO WITH GREAT LOCATION NEAR CAMPUS, COLLEGE AND WHOLE FOODS

* When you choose to live at Elmwood Estates you will find more than a place to live - you will find a home in a friendly triplex environment with luxury apartment features, exceptional amenities, security, safety and a fabulous locale. Classic Elmwood Victorian architecture blended with modern Scandinavian design features, all done in a recent complete renovation from foundation to roof. Offered is a unique residential opportunity minutes from UC Berkeley, BART, College Avenue Shopping and Whole Foods. With propinquity such as this, no auto is needed. Consider this thoughtfully crafted space with custom features and attention to detail rarely found in apartment living. Spacious, high ceilings with 100-year-old leaded glass windows, complete recent remodel with extensive seismic upgrades. Berkeley meets Scandinavia. Architectural/ Kitchen layout / design by well-known local architect.

* Redone white oak floors, dedicated gas hot water heater, direct vent gas heater, energy efficient windows and insulation for noise reduction and energy savings. Full bath, hand held shower. Linen closet. Grohe and Porche fixtures. Levelor opaque blinds, recessed lights w dimmers. Safety and security considered paramount. Controlled Access Building with front entry via intercom/buzzer, private rear entry access through security gate with keypad/remote. Sequential motion sensor lights create light pools to parking and rear patio area. Controlled ambient lighting in BBQ/ garden space. High speed Wi-fi included, cable ready.

* Rear outdoor screened space with garden, BBQ, patio area furnished with teak furniture, all protected by security gate. Perfect for outdoor gatherings.

* Kitchen with granite, built in eating area, stainless steel sink, pull out faucet, gas range and stove, range hood with direct vent, wine glass holder, new cabinets, garbage disposal. Functional layout done in concert with local chef for gourmet cooking.

* In unit Maytag high efficiency washer / dryer, unlimited use included in rent.

*Secure bicycle parking, protected by security gate, camera, and motion sensor lights.

*On site storage included.

*Off street parking available in rear of building with security gate, remote/keypad access, camera and motion sensor light protection. Contact Landlord for details if interested.

* Pets welcome - cats and dogs. Breed restrictions. Canines in photo not included in lease.

*Terms include security deposit 500.00 USD. Prefer long term tenant as community atmosphere is encouraged. Available May 1st, may view with 24 hours notice. Fabulous apt, last tenant for 3 years, will not be available long.

* Text communication preferred



•	INCOME VERIFICATION
o	Most recent pay stub, W-2, or tax return. Applicants that do not meet our income requirements must provide a guarantor application. International students should also provide proof of full time enrollment as well as proof of income in the form of most recent bank statement, or verifiable letter from your bank indicating your current balance in your account.

o	Guarantor to sign and verify.

•	1 Bedroom and 2 Bedroom also available.

listings.title: 1 BD Apt., Great South Berkeley Location

listings.description:
Perfect condo for students and/or young professionals available on and after 4/4

This lovely 1 bedroom/1 bath, 745 sq ft apartment features laminate floors throughout (ex-kitchen and bathroom), floor to ceiling windows, 4 big closets, an balcony on the high floor with a refreshing view of green hills and hiking trails, as well as, spacious bedroom and living room. 

Enjoy a comfortable living with kitchen appliances including electric stove/oven, dishwater, refrigerator, trash disposal, and recirculating range hood. Let alone to say the additional perks such as free heated water, one parking space, and one storage space on the lobby floor.

This place is also a commuter's heaven with 
* the AC transit stops right in front of the building and takes you to downtown SF or UC Berkeley within 30 minutes
* 8 minute drive to El Cerrito Plaza BART station
* daily casual carpool stop is also available in front of the 99 Ranch Market, within 5-minute walk

The Gateview Apartments complex is truly a unique and wonderful place to call home, with:
* 24-hr security/patrol, 
* guest parking upon registration, 
* on-site laundry,
* a modern gym, 
* aerobics room, 
* heated pool, 
* tennis courts, 
* Jacuzzi, 
* Sauna room, 
* club house (need reservation), 
* manicured garden, 
* modernized elevators, and
* on-site mailbox

Staying at this complex means you will be able to walk to:
* Solano Street restaurants, 
* a variety of grocers (99 Ranch Market, Lucky, Trader Joe's), 
* farmers' market (Tuesdays and Saturdays), and
* the eucalyptus grove (hiking trail).

Costco,Safeway, Target, the Tokyo Fish Market, and El Cerrito Yoga are all within 10 minutes drive. 
You can even get to IKEA, AMC theater, Golden Gate Fields (for horse racing), Albany bulb (pet lovers' paradise), and Kaady Car Wash (aka best of East Bay) within 15 minutes of drive. Convenient access to freeways 80/580/880, 20 minutes to SF (when there's no traffic), 45 minutes to Napa.

Albany also has a very reputable school district with Albany High (9 out of 10, Albany Middle (9 out of 10, Cornell Elementary (9 out of 10. 

Monthly rent: $2200

Terms & Conditions
* initial 6 month lease, after which renewable month by month
* first and last month rent + $1000 security/cleaning deposit
* small- to medium-sized cat or dog are okay but tenant needs to put up additional $300 deposit for each pet
* tenant is responsible for $400 of move-in cost, and $250 for each subsequent move-in (charged by the HOA)
* monthly rent is subject to annual adjustment to cover for increases in property tax and HOA dues
* water and garbage expenses are covered by the landlord. And tenant will be responsible for all other utilities such as internet, cable TV, and electricity.
* strict policy against sublet, but co-lease may be okay upon interview
* strict no-smoking (of any kind), no-drinking-party policy
* The ideal candidate should be responsible, considerate, respectful to others, clean, friendly and paying rent on time

To apply, please
* Provide current credit report (dated within 1 month of application)
* 2 professional references
* Proof of stable financial resources: such as last 2 months of pay stubs or bank statements
* International students are OK
* a brief description of your background, education, occupation, hobby and/or lifestyle

CL mail to schedule appointment for showing; appointments available starting this weekend.

listings.description:
Are you part of a group, and looking for a gorgeous house right near UC Berkeley, in the most yummy part of town -- in the northside gourmet ghetto?

For more than 10 years, our house has been hosting groups of undergrads and grad students. Everyone who has lived here has loved it. Your group, will too!

This house is fully furnished with a total of 20 beds within 7 bedrooms.

Your group of up to 20 can rent the entire house, or, you can rent a block of beds.

The house is open for move-in August 15 2016. We also have availabilities during the summer for anyone who needs summer accommodations.

House Features and Details You'll Appreciate. . .
- Awesome 170 meg download internet! This house is ultra wired and ready to roll!
- 7 bedrooms: 1 Single, 2 Doubles, 2 Triples, and 2 Quads, all are furnished.
- The rooms are quite large with fantastic views, big windows, sunlight. Most rooms have twin beds, the single has a full bed.
- Huge living/dining room & kitchen fully equipped with everything you'll need to cook, 3 refrigerators
- Big-Screen HDTV, 2 printers, NEST smart thermostats so you can easily monitor heating usage in winter
- Washer/dryer, dishwasher, up to date appliances
- So close to campus, you can walk in 5 to 15 minutes depending where you're going.
- Perfect Location in the Gourmet Ghetto.... Berkeley's finest restaurants, a drugstore just down the block, multiple grocery stores & farmer's markets
- Redwood deck in the back is the perfect place to hang out in the sun, study, have a get-together, BBQ
- Green electricity from solar panels, numerous other ecological house features

Rental Price
Important Note -- The rental price listed, $1699, is the average cost per person per month if you book in advance and you are part of a group. Multiply that number by the number of people in your group to get the total cost per month. The price may be higher or lower depending on size of group, send us an application for further details. Utilities cost is an average of 100 per person per month. 

Want to See More Photos & a Video?
Email us for way more photos plus a video tour of the house.

How To Apply
Please email us and we'll respond with details on how to apply.

Thanks, we look forward to meeting you soon. And... GO BEARS!

listings.title: Spacious 1 bedroom luxury apartment 2 blocks from campus

listings.description:
Renters are facing really difficult times right now with very high rent, crazy security deposits, no pets being accepted and landlords want you to have perfect credit and income 3 times or 4 higher than the rent just to allow you to rent their house and pay it off for them. Then they want to increase the rent every time the lease it up and in many cases ask you to move so they can sell the house or move back into it. 

We can send you all of the program information in writing just by sending a request. it includes all of our licensing information. Most people qualify when they have a 620 or higher credit score and can document your income. We get so many people who worry this is a scam but everything we provide you is verifiable through multiple governmental sources.

I have sold homes from Berkeley to Discovery Bay for 27 years. I have managed special financing programs provided by the State and Federal Government that encourage renters to become home owners by providing financing options that don't require perfect credit and in most cases cost less to get into than a rental these days. The financing is 30 year fixed rate and includes property taxes, and all the insurance. Simply put, people who bought homes 15 years ago are still paying the same payment they had originally and you will have the same payment 15 years after you buy the house. Landlords will obviously not be keeping the rent at the same level.

In addition there are tax benefits that you get as a homeowner that help most people save thousands per year in Income Tax. This is the part where many people start to think this is a scam or baloney in general. To help with that we offer two things. I am going to give you ways to confirm the information. In addition I can send you an e mail that has both detailed breakdowns on the programs as well as an e mail that has the properties available with pictures and details. 

The programs that we utilize are FHA, VA, USDA Guaranteed, we also use CHDAP California Housing Down Payment Assistance Program, and CHFA California Housing Finance Agency. These last two programs are state based and provide almost 100% of the down payment you need for the FHA Loan. USDA and VA don't require any down payment. 

This is just 1 of the homes that are available in San Leandro, Hayward, San Lorenzo and Oakland. THERE IS AN E MAIL LIST AVAILABLE THAT GIVES YOU ALL THE DETAILS OF THE PROGRAM AND THE INSTRUCTIONS TO GET QUALIFIED AS WELL AS PICTURES AND DETAILS OF ALL THE HOUSES. PLEASE TEXT OR E MAIL THE REQUEST WITH YOUR E MAIL ADDRESS SO I CAN SEND THESE TO YOU.

This home in San Leandro is 4 bedrooms 2 bathrooms and 1750 square feet. It has a 1 car attached garage and this is all on a lot that is almost 4,000 square feet. 

There are 50 homes available from $2175-$3400 and the homes are 760-2200 square feet with 1-5 bedrooms. There are also Condominiums and Townhomes that have payments ranging from $1625-$2720 per month with 1-4 bedrooms and 680-1700 square feet. These properties will have a separate Home Owners Association due per month of $200-$430 per month. 

The cost to move into one of the homes will typically be $3,000-$5,000. Your first payment will not be due until 30 days after you move in.

To qualify you must have at least
1. A credit score of 620 or higher (credit karma is a place to check if you aren't sure of your credit score)
2. You will need to prove your income with the last 30 days paystubs and the last 2 years tax returns
3. No Bankruptcy in the last 2 years
4. No Short Sale, or Foreclosure in the last 3 years.

Licensed by the California Department of Real Estate Eric Wexelman

I can respond fastest to texts and e mails as I can't answer calls when I am with my other clients.

listings.title: berkeley 2 bedroom aprtment

listings.description:
I am looking for one mature and reliable person to live in my adorable studio. There is a private bathroom, pull out love seat, a natural gas fire pit in the yard, a storage shed, a gas grill, and a few fruit trees. There is a kitchenette with a nice double induction burner, blender/food processor, induction kettle, microwave, convection oven, plenty of storage space,and mini-fridge. The room is fully furnished with queen bed, pillows, desk and chair, heater, sheets, towels, and kitchen supplies (including some staples like spices, rice, four, oil, etc). I will even consider letting you use my bike if you are trustworthy. The place is really cute with lots of light. The neighborhood is very quiet. There is a great park 2 blocks away and many groceries, coffee shops, laundromats, bars, and restaurants within walking distance. There is a bus at the end of the street that gets you right onto campus within 15 minutes or you can bike there in 15 minutes. You have a pretty great view of the city from the top of the driveway as this neighborhood is up on a hill. Landlord is fine with guests as long as you let her know.

The move in/out dates are semi-negotiable but you would have to be out by August 21st at the latest. $500 deposit (refundable assuming no damage). Rent includes all utilities. No pets - sorry. 

There are a few odd things about the place. The cottage is a mother-in-law suite - as in: it is in the backyard of the main house where the landlord and her 2 children live. The bathroom that goes with the cottage is connected to the back of the main house. It is a private bathroom with only one entrance from the outside which is about ten steps outside the front door of the cottage. So you have to walk outside to get to the bathroom, but not far, and it is your bathroom alone. Also - there is no sink in the studio so you have to do dishes in the bathroom sink. I have a dish drainer setup in the bathroom and the sink is not prohibitively small. While this is a strange setup, I have never had issues with it at all.

The landlord will want to meet you but other than that you won't interact with her much. You basically have 100% privacy in the unit and backyard and it is nice and quiet.

listings.description:
2057 University Avenue was formerly known as the University Hotel. The University Hotel is no longer in operation and the building has since been converted into an apartment building which offers single room apartments. The building is located on University and Shattuck Avenue. It is located 2 blocks away from the west end of the UC Berkeley Campus. It is a few short blocks away from modes of public transportation such as AC Transit and Bart. The Downtown Berkeley Bart Station connects Berkeley with the greater Bay Area. Bart, which is the Bay Area's Rapid Transit rail system makes it possible to reach destinations such as Downtown San Francisco or the San Francisco International Airport in a matter of minutes. The building is nearby the many eateries, shops, and businesses which make up Downtown Berkeley located on Shattuck Avenue. You will be sharing a common bathroom with all utilities included. Please call Raj Properties at



The room is a single dorm style room with a private bathroom. The room is ideal for a person looking to live a minimalist lifestyle. The room itself is cozy and includes built in wall shelves and a desk and chair. The room also includes a mini refrigerator and a microwave. The room does not have a kitchen sink or stove. The building has a lot of character. Walking through the hallways transports you to another time in Berkeley's history.

Beautiful, spacious and exclusive Hiller Highlands townhome at the top of the hill. 2,464 sf 3BD/2.5BA. Built in 1994. Expansive views of all 3 Bay bridges. HOA includes tennis courts, pool, mini golf and clubhouse.

Living room w/handcrafted Tuscan fireplace, office/reading nook, bay windows plantation shutters, decks and panoramic Bay views from both the living and master bedrooms. Beautifully appointed eat-in kit w/custom cabinetry, granite counters, sub-zero fridge. Master suite w/vaulted ceiling, large outdoor deck. Lower level multipurpose room with laundry. Big enough for pool/ping pong table or rec room for kids. 2 car garage. Central vacuum system. Redwood patio deck with built in gas for BBQ.

Quick access to Walnut Creek/San Francisco via Hwys 24 & 580, Claremont Country Club, and UC Berkeley. AC Transit line on Hiller Drive. No smoking. Prefer no pets, but pet fee if approved. 1 year lease preferred. $4500/mo + HOA fees. Verified references and income documentation.

Thank you

✿✿✿... BERKELEY'S BEST MODERN HIGHER QUALITY... &... CLOSE TO CAMPUS STUDENT HOME RENTED FOR 30 PLUS YEARS TO CAL STUDENTS...LOCATED on the South Side in the MOST RESPECTED and CALM..."ELMWOOD NEIGHBORHOOD. 
****************************************************************************************************************************************** 

Address is 2740 Parker Street, Berkeley, CA.... A short walk to Campus...along College and stop at the great Strada Coffee House at College and Bancroft. This Secluded, Quiet...Beautiful Garden House...Sleeps 5 to 7 people maximum allowed in this 5 Bedroom & 2 full Bathroom Family House . Sq Footage Approx: 2,100 
Pet Policy: No pets. 
*******************************************************************************************************************************************

✿...REQUIRED...Call Robert to tell about your group if they are qualified by having only Excellent habits for HOUSEKEEPING and REFERENCES AS EXPERIENCED TENANTS with SOLID PAST HOUSING REFERENCES...☎☎☎...4.1.5...3.4.5... 9.7.4.7

( ENABLES OWNER TO REMEMBER YOU IN YOUR GROUP ).
*******************************************************************************************************************************
✿✿✿...REQUIREMENTS TO LEASE: THE GROUP SELECTED AS RENTERS NEEDS TO BE EXCELLENT HOUSEKEEPERS ...Any group with people who are not able to put sufficient time into keeping this beautiful house and garden very prideful...should not even apply as this is a newly remodeled & higher quality home with wonderful new features: 
*...5 second floor Skylights.
*...All new double pane Windows...with screens
*...New modern dual wall Lights in every room...+ Track Lighted living room
*...Two all new Classy Bathrooms...each with double sinks
*...Secluded rear garden home with private yard
*...Spacious modern all kitchen...2 refrigerators
*...Front loading Washer & Dryer
*...Bright Modern Interior Design
*...Bright modern interiors
****************************************************************************************************************************** 

SECLUDED GARDEN HOUSE...2 blocks above College Ave ...2740 PARKER STREET

WALK COLLEGE AVE TO CLASS...just a 6 minute walk from start of campus at BANCROFT WAY and COLLEGE AVE...where you can stop at the always fun STRADA outdoor coffee house. 

***INSPIRING HOUSE once the former Home and Ballet studio of Madam Nijinski, Berkeley's famous dance teacher and sister of world renowned Russian star of the same name.

*****************************************************************************************************************************************
***TO SEE: CALL ROBERT...if you qualify...☎ 4.1.5 ...3.4.5...9.7.4.7. for an appointment ... PLEASE CALL ONLY if your group is composed of every person being a Excellent Housekeeper and an Experienced Tenant with Verifiable References...as to your past experience caring for a residence leased to you.
****************************************************************************************************************************************

***This secluded garden home at 2740 Parker Street is just a 6 to 8 minute pleasant walk to campus going through Berkeley's charming middle class ELMWOOD neighborhood along COLLEGE AVE. Please note that this 1/2 student & 1/2 regular citizen neighborhood has a reputation of a quiet, calm and a family atmosphere less dense than other areas...even though we are just minutes from campus.

*********************************************************************************************************************************
NOTE: Owner is looking for cohesive tenant group who can agree to not have any smoking, loud music and party's with guests invited. You must commit your self to a calm study oriented lifestyle to be considered. Neighbors want respectful behavior.

***IMPORTANT: MEMBERS OF GROUP WANTING TO RENT THIS HOUSE NEED TO HAVE FIRST MONTH RENT SHARE & SECURITY DEPOSIT FUNDS AVAILABLE BY CHECK,CASH OR CASHIERS CHECK WITHIN 24 HOURS.
*******************************************************************************************************************************


***The private brown shingle house has been rented for 38 years to CAL STUDENTS...who have said this was their most fun residence at UC. Typically the 5 bedrooms are shared with between 5 to 7 students leasing the quiet home.

***From the wood fence and gate at 2740 Parker walk down the gravel garden path to the sunny rear yard and the English Country Garden Home. Here you can bar-b-que, sun and study in your private yard. 

***Inside ...this very peaceful home is on two levels with four bedrooms on the 2nd floor along with 5 skylights ...you can be yourself here...removed from noise and the general density of Berkeley campus life.

***The very large main floor living room with redwood panel walls, wood floors & a big Yosemite like stone fireplace and many windows that open to the garden ...is the space that was once the Ballet Teaching Studio. The room has high ceilings and a warm almost country feeling. Students sharing this space have often made two or three sub spaces for their study desk or for relaxing. 

***There is also a new kitchen with quartz counters and a dishwasher, disposal, two refrigerators and a new clothes washer and dryer.


- 

COMMUNITY FEATURES 

***... LEASE TERMS ......................................................................................................................
***Term: June 1, 2016 to May 31, 2017
***Rent $8,250. per month.
***Security Deposit: $ 1,250. each person.
***Non Smoking requirement both inside house & in yard. 
***Group must agree to No Party's allowed on property
***Tenants maintenance of home & yard required 
***Street parking only by permit for residents allowed
***Tenants pay all utilities...possibly adding $50. + per month for each student is average 


Robert Zolly, Owner

The private, very quiet ,detached cottage space has 2 rooms; One room is a big like walk in closet that can also be an office. The other room , slightly larger has the loft used for storage or your bed . Lots of light and total privacy. THE BATHROOM AND KITCHEN ARE IN THE MAIN HOME. 

Only respond if you enjoy being outdoors and if you dont mind that you will have to come in to the main house for use of the bathroom and kitchen that is separate from your cottage. Another wards, you basically are in your own space! I lived out there for a bit and it is so lovely. 

975.00 includes WIFI, utilities, laundry, total use of the kitchen and bathroom. And cats to love you ! Expected is first months rent plus security deposit and rental agreement signed with references of work or school. 

I am in the main home in front. You will be sharing the big kitchen with me ( 3 cats ) and the bathroom. The home is really nicely laid out for solitude and privacy. The area has so much to offer! Walking distance to many wonderful places from micro brewery to whole foods and Apple. 


I would prefer a progressive thinker ( Trump voters please dont bother to respond to this ad) , a good communicator, especially of your requests and feelings. LGBT are welcome and animal lovers only apply please. My cats are my family! If that sounds nuts then its not a good fit for you. 
Less is more here and recycling is a law in Berkeley. It is a very relaxed home yet not so into loud partying here. I dont mind friends or family overnite stays, but only for more then a handful of days a month. The cottage is too small for more then one.

About me: I am of 49 yrs and in the healing profession. When I am home, I much need space to regroup, but the weekends I do enjoy gathering socially, a brunch or doing something active together. Maybe a hike or bike ride? 

Please respond with a bit about you and what you have in mind as a great place to be for how long? I look forward to hearing from you. 

Be well -

listings.description:
Hello,
I'm looking for someone to take over my lease in April. The lease is until January 8, 2017. My rent is $150 lower than what the apartment complex currently charges. We will need to go through the leasing office to make the lease transfer official. Deposit is $400.

---

This is a huge one-bedroom apartment on the fourth floor of a five-story building facing the Berkeley Hills in a well lit, quiet neighborhood with all the conveniences nearby. The name of the property is Icon at Park. Inside the apartment is very quiet, you will not hear your neighbors due to solid concrete construction! Here are the highlights: huge walk-in closet with washer and dryer, large bedroom closet, huge kitchen with granite countertops and nice appliances, separate office area that could be used as a guest bedroom, bathroom has a deep soaking tub and granite vanity top, nice balcony for your gas or electric grill, reserved parking spot in the secure garage, bike storage in the garage, on-site gym. Maintenance and management are very responsive to any requests, plus there's a friendly cleaning lady who takes care of common areas five days a week, so the entire property is very neat at all times!

The apartment is in great shape, but I'll pay for professional carpet cleaning and paint touch ups before moving out. I'm available to show the property during weekdays by appointment or during weekends.

For an additional cost, I can leave a very comfortable couch and a queen size bed with a really nice mattress, everything is just about a year old. These items are shown on the pictures. 

Here's more info about the complex: https://prometheusreg.com/san-francisco-properties/icon-at-park

listings.description:
Roomy, modern, and well kept apartment. It will become available starting June 1st, and requires a full year lease. It is a 4-unit building, two upstairs and two downstairs.

This building is super convenient to both the Elmwood shopping district, and to UC Berkeley. It is one block north and one block east of the prime shopping area.

4 bedrooms, including a master bedroom with a master bath. The other three bedrooms share a second full bath. Over 1150 square feet! Nice living room, dining area, and kitchen complete the picture. Additional storage shed for bikes or overflow items. 

On-site washer and dryer off the central hallway is shared by the four units.

Central forced air heat in each unit. Tenant pays gas, electricity and water. Landlord pays trash. One parking space in the driveway is included.

***This secluded garden home at 2740 Parker Street is just a 6 to 8 minute pleasant walk to campus going through Berkeley's charming middle class ELMWOOD neighborhood along COLLEGE AVE. Please note that this 1/2 student & 1/2 regular citizen neighborhood has a reputation of a quiet, calm and a family atmosphere less dense than other areas...even though we are just minutes from campus.

*********************************************************************************************************************************
NOTE: Owner is looking for cohesive tenant group who can agree to not have any smoking, loud music and party's with guests invited. You must commit your self to a calm study oriented lifestyle to be considered. Neighbors want respectful behavior.

*******************************************************************************************************************************


***The private brown shingle house has been rented for 38 years to CAL STUDENTS...who have said this was their most fun residence at UC. Typically the 5 bedrooms are shared with between 5 to 7 students leasing the quiet home.

***From the wood fence and gate at 2740 Parker walk down the gravel garden path to the sunny rear yard and the English Country Garden Home. Here you can bar-b-que, sun and study in your private yard. 

***Inside ...this very peaceful home is on two levels with four bedrooms on the 2nd floor along with 5 skylights ...you can be yourself here...removed from noise and the general density of Berkeley campus life.

***The very large main floor living room with redwood panel walls, wood floors & a big Yosemite like stone fireplace and many windows that open to the garden ...is the space that was once the Ballet Teaching Studio. The room has high ceilings and a warm almost country feeling. Students sharing this space have often made two or three sub spaces for their study desk or for relaxing. 

***There is also a new kitchen with quartz counters and a dishwasher, disposal, two refrigerators and a new clothes washer and dryer.


-

listings.description:
Southshore Gardens Apartments is a gated community with a beautiful courtyard and garden setting. We offer one, two-bedroom apartments and cottage homes. 

A two-bedroom apartment is ready for immediate occupancy!! This unit is upstairs, a corner unit, bright and spacious at approximately 875 Square Feet. In additional to the above, a carport parking and a 9' x 3' x 5' carport storage are available. 

Rent: $2,445 (includes water, sewer & garbage). Tenant pays electricity and gas.

Southshore Gardens Apartments is conveniently located in Alameda, a block from beautiful Crown Memorial Beach and the very popular Alameda Town Centre Shopping Center where you will find almost everything you need. The Transbay Express bus to Mission and First Street in Downtown San Francisco, and buses to Fruitvale BART and the Alameda/Oakland Ferry are a few steps away. Freeway 880 is easily accessible to San Francisco, Oakland, Berkeley and Fremont.

Community features:
* Beautiful Courtyard and Garden Setting
* Community Pool
* On-Site Laundry
* Eco Friendly - Recycling 
* On-Site Management and Maintenance
* Assigned Carport Parking
* Free Storage 

Interior Features:
* Wide Glass Window 
* Fresh Paint
* Large Balcony

Come tour our community today. 
We are located at 417 Willow St, Alameda, CA 94501 or call

to schedule for a tour today!

Located in Southside, Berkeley, historically and popularly known as the epicenter of college life at Cal. Take pleasure in outdoor activities at your convenience by being just blocks away from Underhill Field and the historic People's Park. Eat up at the nearby Berkeley dining commons -- Crossroads or Cafe 3 -- or visit the Durant Food Court located on Telegraph Ave for a wide variety of ethnic cuisines.

ABSW Apartments is the ideal place for students desiring that perfect mix of campus life and local social activities!

Luxury home in Berkeley Hills for Rent! Must See! This pristine, executive style home has lovely Bay Views, decks, lush gardens and plenty of living space! Modern, luxury living in the Hills just minutes from Highway 13, UC Berkeley, BART, Claremont and College Avenue shops and restaurants. Very versatile with gracious bedrooms and plenty of space for home offices, playroom/ den and more. 
Master suite with plush new carpet, huge walk-in closet, and an Amazing view from private deck! Hardwood floors throughout main living area. Spacious 2 bed/ 2 Bath Condo is tastefully remodeled with unique touches.

The condo is the largest 2b/2b (1113 Square feet) with the best floor layout (Model F) in the Gate View High-rise Condominiums. This unit is suitable for 2-3 adults and for larger group if agreed the owner may adjust the lease terms accordingly. 
This unit has unobstructed panoramic view of the Bay including Golden Gate Bridge and San Francisco skyline.

listings.description:
Ready for lease is a large studio apartment at $1,550 per month. 

It is a one room apartment, has beautiful hardwood floors and two panoramic windows (in the main room and kitchen) that let in great amounts of natural light. The kitchen is generously sized with granite counter tops and an electric stove.

The location of the building is the best you can get. It is next to a bike path, the 51B, Transbay, and FS buses stop right outside the front door, is only 4 blocks away from the North Berkeley BART station, and located halfway between the Eastshore Freeway and UC Berkeley on University Avenue. 

Parking is available in the garage for $80/month.

We have a no pet policy (unless required by a disability) and no smoking is allowed.

Steam heat, trash collection, recycling, water and hot water are included. Coin-operated laundry machines are located downstairs.

The lease is one-year and would start as soon as your application is accepted. First month's rent and a security deposit of $2,500 is due at signing. If you feel like this building would be a great fit for you, feel free to send me an email with a short bio to set up a viewing.

listings.description:
Fully furnished and nice apartment for rent! We are moving out in mid-May (flexible) and are looking for someone to take over our lease until August 8th; monthly rent is $3280. The apartment fits 4 people, which makes it a total of $820 per person. There is an option to extend the lease for one year, and the monthly rent from August 8th will be $3570 (this rent also includes a parking spot in the garage and extra storage place). We are throwing in the furniture for free since we are returning to our home country and are no longer in need of them.

The apartment is at 2110 Haste Street (Fine Arts Building) close to Shattuck, with a very central location. 5-10 minutes walk from Downtown Berkeley Bart station and 5-10 minutes walk to campus. It has 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, living room and kitchen, and also 2 small storage rooms. It includes 4 beds, 2 dressers, a sofa, chairs, tables and kitchen equipment. Laundry room is located at each floor. The building has a sweet rooftop with a San Francisco view. Movie of apt: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S9ZchX03UWI 

WIFI and cable is included. Other utilities such as water, sewer, garbage, gas and PGE is about 130 dollars each month. Deposit is 600 dollars (in total for the apartment).

We will be happy to answer any questions you may have. Please contact us in either telephone or email.

3-Bedroom apartment located across from Tang Center and the new UC Berkeley Aquatic Center is back on the market! Building is located just 1 block away from the South edge of campus and is perfect for a group of 4 roommates. All apartments in the building were completely renovated in 2013 with brand new plumbing, electrical, floors, amenities, etc. Kitchen / living room area is an open floorplan and features stainless steel appliances and granite countertops. Bathroom was previously remodeled to feature detailed tiling and a nicely done walk-in shower with glass surround.

One bedroom is cozy and is better suited as a single room while the remaining two bedroom are larger and can be used as doubles. One bedroom features large bay windows with a nice view of the surrounding neighborhood and UC Berkeley campus.

Building features a landscaped garden area and bike racks in the rear. Laundry machines are located on-site and accept credit cards for payment and have online monitoring. UC Berkeley campus is within easy walking distance as well as Downtown Berkeley BART / Shattuck Avenue. Multiple AC Transit bus lines are easily accessible from the bus stop 1-block away on Durant or Bancroft.

Kitchen was updated to feature granite countertops and includes appliances (fridge, sink disposal, and electric stove/oven). Cabinets above and below the counters provide lots of storage space for everyday kitchen essentials.

listings.title: **2 bed/1bath mid century modern house for rent $3500/month**

listings.description:
Located in the up-and-coming West Oakland Arts and Crafts District, this 1907 vintage, TWO-bedroom/one bath, UPSTAIRS apartment offers nine-foot high ceilings, BRAND NEW fresh white paint and wall-to-wall, BRAND NEW short-pile, industrial taupe carpeting. 

It is in a freestanding building with four identical two-bedroom apartments, two upstairs and two downstairs. Street parking is easy and ample. 

(IF YOU SEE THIS POSTING, THE APARTMENT IS STILL AVAILABLE. IT WILL NOT BE RENTED UNTIL THE CONCLUSION OF THE OPEN-HOUSE ON SUNDAY, MARCH 6, FROM 11:00AM-1:00 PM ------ I'M SORRY, I AM NOT AVAILABLE TO SHOW THE UNIT BEFORE THE OPEN-HOUSE ON SUNDAY) 

We've completely renovated the kitchen with a BRAND NEW refrigerator, BRAND-NEW over-the-stove microwave, BRAND NEW kitchen cabinets and BRAND NEW kitchen sink and faucet. 

The bathroom has also been COMPLETELY RENOVATED with a BRAND NEW toilet, BRAND NEW bathtub/shower, and BRAND NEW European-style bathroom sink fixture. The bathroom also offers BRAND NEW cabinets and BRAND NEW floor tile. 

There is a nice laundry room on the premises with a coin-op washer and dryer. 

There is a cute, beautifully landscaped backyard with a patio for hanging out, BBQing or entertaining. Each of the four units also gets it's own weather-tight outdoor storage locker, located in the backyard. 

The yard is completely enclosed and fenced to keep intruders out and pets from wandering off. It is a pooch paradise! There is a redwood community table that seats up to 10 for a dinner party. . . If you like to garden, there is an area for you to plant vegetables or flowers...

Located just off West Grand Ave. near Adeline, this building is literally a five-minute, straight-shot drive to the Bay Bridge tollbooth!!! It's a five-minute drive to 880 and 580 onramps. 10 minutes to Emeryville, Berkeley or Downtown Oakland. Ten minutes to Ikea, Trader Joe's, Safeway Pak-And-Save, Nordstrom Rack, Bay Street Mall, Home Depot, Lanesplitter Pizza, Target, Best Buy! Very central and convenient... 

The neighborhood is mixed-use with lofts, warehouses, art-spaces and various industrial workshops, etc. There are also lots of old Victorian houses in various stages of rehab, some gorgeous and some run-down. There is a new charter school (Vincent Academy) 1/2 block away. 

Crime in this neighborhood is mostly a thing of the past, with West Oakland's serious revitalization program underway. New development and creative people are flooding in from Berkeley and San Francisco and have turned this area into a neighborhood for artists, musicians and craftspersons. However it IS an urban neighborhood and can get very noisy sometimes... It's not Piedmont! Locals are sometimes hanging out on the corner, socializing and playing music. It can be like Mardi Gras at times. If you crave quiet and serenity, this may not be the neighborhood for you. It is a VERY friendly neighborhood, but can sometimes be noisy in the daytimes.

The building has a security fence around the perimeter, a security gate at the front entry door and each of the four apartment doors are individually gated, so tenants are SUPER SAFE. We have never had a break-in, or any problem with crime in this building. Nobody has ever been hassled in the 8 years I've owned this building. The neighbors are nice.

A cat or nice dog MAY be OK with a reasonable pet deposit. (Deposit amount dependent on the pet) 

The apartment rent is $1800/month. SORRY, NO SECTION 8 ACCEPTED. 

$1800 refundable security deposit to move in. One UPSTAIRS apartment is available NOW! 

Tenant pays PGE gas and electric. Owner pays water and trash. 

I'll be showing the apartment SUNDAY, March 6, FROM 11:00am - 1:00PM

Please come by during those hours to view the place and meet me... The address is 1084 24th St. Oakland CA 94607. (Major cross-streets are West Grand and Adeline) 

Applications will be available at the time of the showing, or you may bring a renters resume. Pay stubs and/or credit reports are also welcome, but not mandatory for consideration.

THANKS

jeff

listings.description:
Welcome To Higby

Built In 2015.

A refined living experience in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley. With modern apartments and inviting common areas, Higby creates a place that is both home and a gathering space. Within walking distance to craft breweries, celebrated restaurants, organic markets and cultural highlights, Higby celebrated exploration and adventure. 

Higby offers studio, one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley

Modern building amenities include: 
•	Lobby with lounge seating and TV
•	Courtyard with a bocce ball court
•	Roof deck with a barbecue, fire pit, lounge seating and city views
•	Fitness studio
•	Indoor bike storage and work stand
•	Enclosed residential parking garage

Apartment units feature: 
•	Electric ovens
•	Gas range cooktops
•	Dishwashers
•	Washers and dryers

Higby is designed to operate 25% more efficiently than a code-compliant building. Sustainability highlights contributing to Higby's LEED Gold certification include:
•	Locally sourced and recycle content materials
•	Non-toxic finishes and a building-wide green cleaning program
•	Aggressive construction waste recycling program
•	Native, adaptive plantings to reduce water consumption
•	On-site planters to detain and manage storm water 

So Stretch out. Entertain. Sleep it off. Celebrate pajama day. Declare a lost weekend. Take a conference call from home. Do what you do. Live At Higby.

The next showings will be at:
12:00pm sharp on Saturday, March 4th
and 3:00pm sharp on Sunday, March 5thAt 2491 Ellsworth Street in Berkeley 
It's a locking building, so I will meet you out front and take you up at the showing time. Anyone who arrives after that will unfortunately miss the showing


Applications are paper or pdf only, available at the end of the viewing.
All applicants over 18 need to fill out an application and provide a $40 application fee in cashier's check or money order payable to Picardo Arms Apartments.There is a $100 holding deposit. We only process one person's or one set of roommates' applications at a time. The deposit takes the apartment off the market and is refundable for up to three business days. After that, it's non-refundable. Bring all of your documents at the same time, and we process your application well within the three days. If you pass, the deposit becomes the first $100 of your security deposit. If you don't pass, even if your application is processed after the three business days, we return the $100 to you. The $40 application fees are non-refundable once the applications are processed regardless of the result.Applicants must show combined income of at least 3x the rent amount per month gross (pre-tax) and good credit based in the U.S. If credit and income aren't met (and the applicant does not have overly poor credit) then a cosigner may be used. A cosigner applies in the same way with another $40 application fee. A copy of a passport or driver's license and proof of income is required for each application. Proof of income can be in the form of two recent pay stubs, social security checks, pension, trust fund or support checks, or tax returns.
Note for new international residents: if you don't have a credit history in the U.S. because of your national status, you may be exempt from the credit requirement; however, you will still need to meet the income requirement and will be required to pay an increased security desposit.
All fees and charges, including move in fees, must be in the form of cashier's check or money order, payable to Picardo Arms. Once you are a tenant, from your 2nd month onward, you may pay by personal check.

listings.title: 1 BD available in 2 BD apartment, Deck, Spacious, Close to Campus

listings.description:
This one bedroom apartment is a cozy, quiet escape from the busyness of Berkeley. With high vaulted wood beam ceilings, a skylight, and a small wood-burning fireplace, this residence feels like a cabin. It has one spacious bedroom (including two large closets), one bathroom, a large living room, and a charming kitchen, making this apartment perfect for one resident. The apartment itself is tucked off the street, mitigating traffic noise. It has a small side yard, and is surrounded by large trees (redwoods) which keep the apartment cool through the summer. Its location is just off Ashby Ave, right near it's intersection with College Ave. It is close to public transportation, with the 51B stop at College and Ashby being on the same block. Also, as it is right off of College Ave, this apartment is no more than a five minute walk from a bakery, Elmwood Cafe, Ici's, La Med, and other great restaurants and small businesses.

Per the landlord's request, this is a non-smoking apartment, with no pets allowed.

I will be showing the place Friday (March 4th) from 11:30am - 2pm, or Sunday (March 6th) from 3pm-5pm. Please feel free to email me to let me know you are coming, and I will send you the address. When you get here, the apartment is tucked behind a large wood-shingled house. Just walk down the driveway (the driveway to the left of the house if you are facing it) and once you see the carport, turn right. The apartment door will be open. 

*note - due to high interest in the property, I am only able to respond via email. Please check your spam folder if you have not yet received a response*

WALK to the annual Village Art and Jazz Fest, etc. Convenient to nearby AC Transit BUS lines- 2 blks away-(including the TRANS BAY BUS to SF) and freeway access to highways 13, 24 and 580. Just minutes to College Avenue (outstanding shops/restaurants) and UC Berkeley. 

Sited on a large wooded lot with park-like aesthetics and enhanced by a nearby meandering creek(on the property). Enjoy the many fruit trees and bountiful crop of blackberries. Architecture, Location, Charm, Condition add to the desirability of this wonderful residence. If you are new to the Bay Area you will be especially pleased to discover such a unique and treasured neighborhood and this delightful residence. ( This is a special opportunity as homes are rarely available for lease in this area.) Truly the term "ultra charming"...........does apply here.....

Perfect residence for RELOCATION/CORPORATE TRANSFER. The short Bart commute to the City while living in a Tahoe-like setting in an iconic neighborhood ....with GREAT WALK SCORE...... makes for an enjoyable lifestyle while offering great privacy.

Sunlit KITCHEN with Granite counters, breakfast bar, all appliances, including new LG s/s gas stove.

BEAUTIFUL, well maintained CONDITION
(professionally cleaned furnace/air ducts for healthy indoor environment ) 
GARAGE (detached) and long driveway for easy parking - plus plentiful guest parking
(note: garage also has upper level/GREAT STORAGE capacity - useful for extra furniture, sports items, etc.)
Wonderful expansive outdoor areas for reading, relaxing, entertaining / sunny space for VEGETABLE GARDEN.
LARGE level brick patio area (w/bench ) for outdoor enjoyment
EXPANSIVE LEVEL AREA , desirable privacy....yet an easy walk just a few blocks away to the center of Montclair Village

NO SMOKING - NO DOGS please....................

Lovely 1-bedroom end unit, farthest from street now available in 1920's single story, Mediterranean triplex, restored to original 1920's charm. 

***** Call Michael at

to view the unit. *****

Beautifully restored to 1920s charm from the ground up by an Architecture/Landscape Architect with modern standards of; electrical, plumbing, sheetrock, insulation and sound proofing, bathrooms, kitchens, lighting and so forth. This unit features light hardwood floors, large French windows and doors, antique light fixtures and tiled bathroom with a full tub/shower. The unit was just remolded and has a new kitchen (all new cabinetry) with a state of the art European, bottom freezer refrigerator, garbage disposal, tankless water heater for low PG&E bills and a fantastic pistachio Wedgewood free standing stove. It is warm, sunny and private and full of unique charm.

The apartment is just off a quiet, sunny courtyard setting, with fruit and palm trees and fragrant flowers, columns, fountains, statues and water lilies. There is also a communal area and patio in the back of the building. 

Location is close to major bus lines, neighborhood markets, shopping, restaurants, cafes (Trieste is on the corner, Paisan and other great restaurant are within one block) and freeway entrances.

listings.description:
Located on the 28th floor, this special unit is one of the few penthouses (with floor to ceiling windows) and has the most desirable western facing view of the Golden Gate Bridge and San Francisco Bay. The other units available in this building are smaller, on a lower floor, do not have floor to ceiling windows, or have a view of the hills or of the northbound freeway, not the bay and sunsets.

With sweeping views of the Bay and Golden Gate Bridges, the San Francisco Skyline & the Oakland Skyline...Pacific Park Plaza has something for everyone and is a commuter's dream! It is located about 1 mile from the Bay Bridge and close to the Eastshore Freeways, as well as Berkeley and Downtown Oakland and Downtown San Francisco. This has a better commute to downtown SF than if you lived in many parts of SF!

The building is across the street from the Emery Bay shopping area and Public Market Complex. It is 1/2 a mile walk to Bay Street or the Trader Joe's. It's 1.2 miles from Berkeley Bowl West (Heinz Street). 

UNIT DESCRIPTION: Home features a spacious open floor plan with large floor to ceiling windows, 9 foot high ceilings, and an open galley kitchen. 1 master bedroom (with attached full bathroom) with dining/living room, and separate den/study which can be used as a 2nd bedroom (has a full closet and the best view of the bay from this room). Spacious full kitchen with fridge, microwave, stove, oven and dishwasher. Half bathroom (sink and toilet) in hallway. The unit is fully carpeted, except for the kitchen and entryway. This layout is known as Floorplan "A" with 1144 square feet.

We require a 1 year lease and security deposit. No Pets, No Smoking. Other restrictions from the Condo Association may apply.

ACCESS: Local - Emery Go Round public bus service is free! http://www.emerygoround.com/maps---schedules.html It takes you to many places including the Ashby Bart Station. 1/2 mile walk to Amtrak Station. 

To SF - the AC Transit J Line to SF stops right in front of the building. Return via the AC Transit Z Line. Or take Ashby Bart via Emery Go Round.

PPP Amenities:

- Panoramic and dramatic San Francisco/Oakland Views
- 2 private balconies
- Dishwasher & Disposal
- 1 Reserved parking space in covered garage 
- Overflow Parking in South Garage (outdoor, fenced access, non-reserved)
- Basic Cable TV Service

- Elevators
- 24 Hr Security Patrol
- Air Conditioning & Heater (tenant pays pg&e)

- 24-Hour Full-Size Gym on-site

- Basket Ball Court
- 2 Tennis Courts
- Sauna & Steam Room

Welcome To Higby

Built In 2015.

A refined living experience in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley. With modern apartments and inviting common areas, Higby creates a place that is both home and a gathering space. Within walking distance to craft breweries, celebrated restaurants, organic markets and cultural highlights, Higby celebrated exploration and adventure. 

Higby offers studio, one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley

Modern building amenities include: 
•	Lobby with lounge seating and TV
•	Courtyard with a bocce ball court
•	Roof deck with a barbecue, fire pit, lounge seating and city views
•	Fitness studio
•	Indoor bike storage and work stand
•	Enclosed residential parking garage

Apartment units feature: 
•	Electric ovens
•	Gas range cooktops
•	Dishwashers
•	Washers and dryers

Higby is designed to operate 25% more efficiently than a code-compliant building. Sustainability highlights contributing to Higby's LEED Gold certification include:
•	Locally sourced and recycle content materials
•	Non-toxic finishes and a building-wide green cleaning program
•	Aggressive construction waste recycling program
•	Native, adaptive plantings to reduce water consumption
•	On-site planters to detain and manage storm water 

So Stretch out. Entertain. Sleep it off. Celebrate pajama day. Declare a lost weekend. Take a conference call from home. Do what you do. Live At Higby.

listings.description:
The basics:
*Room available for $860 in 5-bedroom, 2-bathroom unit
*Northwest of campus at MLK Jr. Way & Francisco St.
*Available April 1st
*Gender balance: 2 girls, 3 guys

The location:
We're in a 5-bedroom, 2-bathroom unit in a big Victorian-looking house (the house is divided into four separate units) in downtown/north Berkeley. It's a great location: three blocks/5-minute walk from University Ave. (including bus lines and Trader Joe's); a 10-minute walk to downtown Berkeley BART and west campus (along Oxford St.); and a 10-minute walk to the Gourmet Ghetto (Cheeseboard, Andronico's, Safeway, etc.).

The street is residential and the neighborhood is very nice to walk around. Besides being close to North Shattuck and University Ave., we're also a couple blocks from the Ohlone Greenway (at Hearst and MLK) and about half a mile to the track at Martin Luther King Middle School (at Hopkins and MLK).

The place:
We have the entire top (third) floor of the house, which includes five good size bedrooms, two big bathrooms, and a kitchen/common area with hardwood floor, a dishwasher, and lots of natural light. The available bedroom is $860/month and has a window, a skylight, a mirrored closet and carpet floors. It's about 11 x 17 ft.

We share utilities, which average to about $60/month (we have Comcast internet and TV, and also pay for PG&E and water). There is a coin-operated washer and dryer for laundry downstairs (shared by the four units); it's $1.25 to wash, $1.25 to dry. The house also has access to a bike rack and outdoor patio with some seating and a barbecue. Our landlord is responsive and takes great care of the place, including landscaping and addressing maintenance issues if they arise. We're all pretty clean, and it's been easy to keep the bathrooms and common areas nice -- we share the costs of trash bags, toilet paper, etc. (which usually isn't much; when someone buys something for the house, they mark it on our spreadsheet so it is incorporated into the rent).

One last note: Sorry, but we can only have one person in the room, and aren't able to have cats or dogs in the house. Also, smoking is not allowed in the house.

The parking situation:
If you have a car, there's free parking on one side of MLK (excluding one street sweeping day per month), though it's a good idea to get a parking permit with the city for $55/year to be able to park anywhere in this part of town (you'd just need to re-register your car to this address).

You'd be joining four awesome housemates: 

Louis is a 4th year PhD student at Cal. A native Midwesterner and adopted East Coaster before heading west, he is still amazed by the number of hikes within 2 hours of Berkeley. Officially, he's training to be an environmental and energy economist. Unofficially, he's an avid foodie, an amateur pianist, an up-and-coming runner, and a recovering night owl.

Daniel is a 5th year PhD Student at Cal, who moved to Berkeley from Australia, although most folks think he sounds British (including some Australians). He loves reading, exercising, singing and coffee. He is indifferent to vegemite.

Andrea is an Architectural Designer, working towards becoming a full-blown Architect. She is originally from Sacramento and loves sports of any kind, preferring to play them rather than watch them. She also loves to cook, hike, bike, ski, kayak, creative projects, laugh and likes to keep things clean and organized.

Harrison is a jovial fellow who is fiercely proud of both his Bostonian and Greek heritages. He drives his car for Lyft whilst planning new travel adventures, and career moves. He also enjoys food, discussing politics, religion, and pretty much anything you want to talk about. He's an inquisitive soul.

We're all pretty low-key and maintain an easy-going environment in our house; people do their own thing, but we're all friendly and chat when we're cooking/hanging out/watching TV in the kitchen/common area. People are also always welcome to have friends over for dinner, to hang out, etc. Please feel free to contact us with any questions, or to set up a time to stop by the house.

artistic, poetic, funky, unique.
The cabin is a large studio with apprx. 550 sq ft. a small balcony overlooks the canyon of Sausal Creek, and its winter creek. The living area has french doors leading to the balcony as well as a wall of windows through which the acacias and oak trees are visible. Off the living area is the kitchen with cement counter tops and a gas stove and full size refrigerator with lower freezer compartment. To the right of the entry is a small hallway leading to a walk in closet and tiled bathroom with redwood shower stall. The floor is a composite wood shearing material (OSB)... Parking is off-street and an on-site laundry room.
The cabin is located behind a brown shingle duplex 4674 Dolores Ave. Oakland 94602. Face the duplex and walk down the driveway on the left and through a wooden gate, continue down the path to cabin. Dolores is a quiet street one block long which intersects Park Blvd. Park Blvd has direct bus lines to SF and informal commute stops as well as transport to downtown Oakland and Berkeley.

Classic Elmwood Edwardian architecture blended with modern Scandinavian design features, all done in a recent complete renovation from foundation to roof. Offered is a unique residential opportunity minutes from UC Berkeley, BART, College Avenue Shopping and Whole Foods. With propinquity such as this, no auto is needed. Consider this thoughtfully crafted space with custom features and attention to detail rarely found in apartment living. Complete recent remodel - no expense spared with attention to details. listings.title: Large Nice 2 BR Apt, Secure Bldg, Good Area, Dwight Way & Dana

listings.description:
AVAILABLE April 1, 2016 
Rent $4400 per month for single family home and parking garage. There will be a shared shared covered deck, sunny outdoor paved area, laundry and jacuzzi. 
The studio in the back will be available in 3 months for an additional $1200 a month (the studio tenant will share above shared areas. You can plan for an au pair or grandparent to live on site and with some separation and privacy in the near future. 
If you chose to rent entire compound the price will be $5500/month

SUMMARY: This beautiful Berkeley Bungalow in an awesome-kind-diverse neighborhood. There is a private garage, an artist studio and a JACUZZI will be available as soon as March 19. 

Commuter's Dream: It is a commuter's dream come true. The house as it is across the street from the North Berkeley BART station and on a Bicycle Blvd which connects to Ohlone Greenway Path taking you to many other bike paths along the bay and to Oakland. Casual Carpool to San Francisco (both Financial District and unique Civic Center drop offs) is only at this Bart Station. Two different Tech company buses pick up across the street at North Berkeley BART station(yes they go to Mountain View). Many AC transit buses 1-3 blocks away 
The Lawrence Lab bus is very close by for scientist working in CAL. 

The house:
1920's charm with modern practicality. Officially a 3 Bedroom and currently it is set up as 2 bedroom plus a family room. There is 1 bathroom with tub. There is no carpet in this home. Beautiful hardwood flooring through most of home, tile in bathroom and marmoleum in kitchen and family room. It is a perfect for a family with allergies. Double paned windows throughout home. All copper plumbing. All modern electric. Ceiling fans in both bedrooms. Central Heating for home. Gourmet kitchen with Dacor gas oven (including convection) and gas range and Bosch dishwasher. All stainless steel appliances, granite countertop and Marmoleum floors. INstant hot water dispenser makes tea time a breeze. Marmoleum is a natural material made from flax seed. It is soft on your joints and stays a comfortable temperature. 
There is room for a Kitchen sitting area and also a formal dining room with original 1920's built in china cabinet. You can also dine alfresco on the lovely porch with a Sunbrella awning to protect you from sun and rain. 
There is a private garage, an artist studio, outside deck, paved backyard open space and a JACUZZI! 

DATES:
This amazing house will be available for rent as soon as March 20, if someone needs a fast move in. Move in date and rent will be somewhat flexible for a friend or family member who comes highly recommended and signs a long contract. Please spread the word to your friends and family. 

Location, Location, Location! 
Schools nearby. The house is just a few blocks away from Shu Ren International School Early Childhood Center, The Berkeley School, The Crowden School
and Jefferson Elementary. If your children go to BUSD schools and are eligible for School Bus Transport, the pick up is 1 block away. (Including Thousand Oaks and LeConte). The corner lot is at a cul-de-sac. There are amazing bakeries, several delicious organic cafes, a couple of amazing Pizza spots, family friendly Thai and Sushi, 2 Mexican restaurants and a second hand clothing store. There is a barber shop, beauty salon and Monterey market nearby as well. Did I mention there are 4 parks, 2 cafes, 2 pizzerias, Monterrey Market and much much more within walking distance? 

UTILITIES
Gas, cable, internet and phone will be your responsibility.
Electricity will be charged once a year. If you're energy conscious you will be pleased with the bill. If your net energy use is balanced, the cost will be $15 month (this is the cost to be hooked up to the grid). If you consume more energy than the panels produce, you will pay additional difference. Solar panels are leased and the Electricity is metered as Net Energy Use. 
Garbage and water will be paid by landlord. (Please separate recycling, compost and landfill material responsibly. Please remember we are in a drought and use water wisely).


More pictures to come
Please contact me at if you would like information about open house and application process
No Pets
No smoking
Will require (3 months rent to move in) first months, last months and security deposit.
