LUXURY ELMWOOD EDWARDIAN UPPER FLAT WITH GREAT LOCATION NEAR UC CAMPUS, COLLEGE AVE AND WHOLE FOODS
* When you choose to live at Elmwood Estates you will find more than a place to live - you will find a home in a friendly triplex environment with luxury apartment features, exceptional amenities, security, safety and a fabulous locale. Classic Elmwood Edwardian architecture blended with modern Scandinavian design features, all done in a recent complete renovation from foundation to roof. Offered is a unique residential opportunity minutes from UC Berkeley, BART, College Avenue Shopping and Whole Foods. With propinquity such as this, no auto is needed. Consider this thoughtfully crafted space with custom features and attention to detail rarely found in apartment living. Complete recent remodel - no expense spared with attention to details. Berkeley meets Scandinavia. Architectural/ Kitchen layout / design by well-known local architect. Designed for maximum natural light exposure. Sunny south facing deck.
* Redone white oak floors, dedicated gas hot water heater, direct vent gas heater, energy efficient windows and insulation for noise reduction and energy savings. Full bath, hand held shower. Additional 1/2 bath. Deck access via master bedroom as well as kitchen. Linen closet. Grohe and Porche fixtures. Levelor opaque blinds, recessed lights w dimmers. Safety and security considered paramount. Controlled Access Building with front entry via intercom/buzzer, private rear entry access through security gate with keypad/remote. Sequential motion sensor lights create light pools to parking and rear patio area. Total seismic upgrade. High speed Wi-fi included, cable ready.
* Rear outdoor screened space with garden, BBQ, patio area furnished with teak furniture, all protected by security gate. Controlled ambient lighting in BBQ/ garden space. Perfect for outdoor gatherings with friends and colleagues.



2410 Russell St APT C,
Berkeley, CA 94705

Welcome To Higby

Built In 2015.

A refined living experience in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley. With modern apartments and inviting common areas, Higby creates a place that is both home and a gathering space. Within walking distance to craft breweries, celebrated restaurants, organic markets and cultural highlights, Higby celebrated exploration and adventure. 

Higby offers studio, one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley

Modern building amenities include: 
•	Lobby with lounge seating and TV
•	Courtyard with a bocce ball court
•	Roof deck with a barbecue, fire pit, lounge seating and city views
•	Fitness studio
•	Indoor bike storage and work stand
•	Enclosed residential parking garage

Apartment units feature: 
•	Electric ovens
•	Gas range cooktops
•	Dishwashers
•	Washers and dryers

Higby is designed to operate 25% more efficiently than a code-compliant building. Sustainability highlights contributing to Higby's LEED Gold certification include:
•	Locally sourced and recycle content materials
•	Non-toxic finishes and a building-wide green cleaning program
•	Aggressive construction waste recycling program
•	Native, adaptive plantings to reduce water consumption
•	On-site planters to detain and manage storm water 

So Stretch out. Entertain. Sleep it off. Celebrate pajama day. Declare a lost weekend. Take a conference call from home. Do what you do. Live At Higby.

Welcome To Higby

Built In 2015.

A refined living experience in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley. With modern apartments and inviting common areas, Higby creates a place that is both home and a gathering space. Within walking distance to craft breweries, celebrated restaurants, organic markets and cultural highlights, Higby celebrated exploration and adventure. 

Higby offers studio, one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley

Modern building amenities include: 
•	Lobby with lounge seating and TV
•	Courtyard with a bocce ball court
•	Roof deck with a barbecue, fire pit, lounge seating and city views
•	Fitness studio
•	Indoor bike storage and work stand
•	Enclosed residential parking garage

Apartment units feature: 
•	Electric ovens
•	Gas range cooktops
•	Dishwashers
•	Washers and dryers

Higby is designed to operate 25% more efficiently than a code-compliant building. Sustainability highlights contributing to Higby's LEED Gold certification include:
•	Locally sourced and recycle content materials
•	Non-toxic finishes and a building-wide green cleaning program
•	Aggressive construction waste recycling program
•	Native, adaptive plantings to reduce water consumption
•	On-site planters to detain and manage storm water 

So Stretch out. Entertain. Sleep it off. Celebrate pajama day. Declare a lost weekend. Take a conference call from home. Do what you do. Live At Higby.

We've a cozy modern large 1 bedroom approx. 680 sq ft located in Watergate next to the Emeryville Marina. It's a quiet TOP floor unit with enclosed balcony and beautiful mountain views! 

Property Description:
Watergate is a beautifully landscape 24 acre community on the Emeryville Peninsula on San Francisco Bay. There are 1247 condominium homes in six low rise buildings. There is an extensive variety of recreational facilities and programs. Watergate is conveniently located one mile north from the Bay Bridge, west of the East Shore Freeway 880 and 80, within minutes of downtown San Francisco and /Berkeley. listings.description:
Are you part of a group, and looking for a gorgeous house right near UC Berkeley, in the most yummy part of town -- in the northside gourmet ghetto?

For more than 10 years, our house has been hosting groups of undergrads and grad students. Everyone who has lived here has loved it. Your group, will too!

This house is fully furnished with a total of 20 beds within 7 bedrooms.

Your group of up to 20 can rent the entire house, or, you can rent a block of beds.

The house is open for move-in August 15 2016. We also have availabilities during the summer for anyone who needs summer accommodations.

House Features and Details You'll Appreciate. . .
- Awesome 170 meg download internet! This house is ultra wired and ready to roll!
- 7 bedrooms: 1 Single, 2 Doubles, 2 Triples, and 2 Quads, all are furnished.
- The rooms are quite large with fantastic views, big windows, sunlight. Most rooms have twin beds, the single has a full bed.
- Huge living/dining room & kitchen fully equipped with everything you'll need to cook, 3 refrigerators
- Big-Screen HDTV, 2 printers, NEST smart thermostats so you can easily monitor heating usage in winter
- Washer/dryer, dishwasher, up to date appliances
- So close to campus, you can walk in 5 to 15 minutes depending where you're going.
- Perfect Location in the Gourmet Ghetto.... Berkeley's finest restaurants, a drugstore just down the block, multiple grocery stores & farmer's markets
- Redwood deck in the back is the perfect place to hang out in the sun, study, have a get-together, BBQ
- Green electricity from solar panels, numerous other ecological house features

Rental Price
Important Note -- The rental price listed, $1699, is the average cost per person per month if you book in advance and you are part of a group. Multiply that number by the number of people in your group to get the total cost per month. The price may be higher or lower depending on size of group, send us an application for further details. Utilities cost is an average of 100 per person per month. 

Want to See More Photos & a Video?
Email us for way more photos plus a video tour of the house.

How To Apply
Please email us and we'll respond with details on how to apply.

Thanks, we look forward to meeting you soon. And... GO BEARS!

listings.description: This apartment is a wonderful, large space in a 1906 house. It has a private side entrance with a tall spiral staircase leading to a deck with views of the east bay hills. There are skylights running the ridge of the roof so there is lots of light. The apartment has a floor plan of 1200 sq ft but the living space is more like 900. It has a claw foot tub with shower and a private duel flush toilet and sink. The kitchen has counter height fridge and freezer and our counters are made of recycled bowling alley. There is a small Wedgewood stove with oven. The main floor of the house has some young (30+) professionals living downstairs. This artistic apartment comes furnished and would be perfect for quiet grad student. Close to West Berkeley restaurants and bus lines direct to UC Berkeley. Easy access to the freeway. Backyard for gardening. No pets. $1800 - includes utilities. Available now.

Welcome To Higby

Built In 2015.

A refined living experience in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley. With modern apartments and inviting common areas, Higby creates a place that is both home and a gathering space. Within walking distance to craft breweries, celebrated restaurants, organic markets and cultural highlights, Higby celebrated exploration and adventure. 

Higby offers studio, one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley

Modern building amenities include: 
•	Lobby with lounge seating and TV
•	Courtyard with a bocce ball court
•	Roof deck with a barbecue, fire pit, lounge seating and city views
•	Fitness studio
•	Indoor bike storage and work stand
•	Enclosed residential parking garage

Apartment units feature: 
•	Electric ovens
•	Gas range cooktops
•	Dishwashers
•	Washers and dryers

Higby is designed to operate 25% more efficiently than a code-compliant building. Sustainability highlights contributing to Higby's LEED Gold certification include:
•	Locally sourced and recycle content materials
•	Non-toxic finishes and a building-wide green cleaning program
•	Aggressive construction waste recycling program
•	Native, adaptive plantings to reduce water consumption
•	On-site planters to detain and manage storm water 

So Stretch out. Entertain. Sleep it off. Celebrate pajama day. Declare a lost weekend. Take a conference call from home. Do what you do. Live At Higby.

Charming studio apartment located on College Avenue near the Elmwood and Rockridge neighborhood border!

Located in the corner of the building, unit receives nice daytime sunlight and views of the front garden area. Unit has a full kitchen area that is separated off of the main living area. Feels more like a junior 1-bedroom than an actual studio unit!

Beautifully maintained hardwood floors are located in the main living areas. Large, oversized walk-in closet offers lots of storage for this studio apartment. Bathroom was also remodeled in 2015 with new fixtures and amenities.

Building is located a short walk to both the Elmwood and Rockridge shopping districts. Numerous shops and restaurants are just a short walk away. Downtown Berkeley and UC Berkeley can be accessed via bike or the 51B bus route on College Ave.

listings.description:
Welcome To Higby

Built In 2015.

A refined living experience in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley. With modern apartments and inviting common areas, Higby creates a place that is both home and a gathering space. Within walking distance to craft breweries, celebrated restaurants, organic markets and cultural highlights, Higby celebrated exploration and adventure. 

Higby offers studio, one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley

Modern building amenities include: 
•	Lobby with lounge seating and TV
•	Courtyard with a bocce ball court
•	Roof deck with a barbecue, fire pit, lounge seating and city views
•	Fitness studio
•	Indoor bike storage and work stand
•	Enclosed residential parking garage

Apartment units feature: 
•	Electric ovens
•	Gas range cooktops
•	Dishwashers
•	Washers and dryers

Higby is designed to operate 25% more efficiently than a code-compliant building. Sustainability highlights contributing to Higby's LEED Gold certification include:
•	Locally sourced and recycle content materials
•	Non-toxic finishes and a building-wide green cleaning program
•	Aggressive construction waste recycling program
•	Native, adaptive plantings to reduce water consumption
•	On-site planters to detain and manage storm water 

So Stretch out. Entertain. Sleep it off. Celebrate pajama day. Declare a lost weekend. Take a conference call from home. Do what you do. Live At Higby.

This unit consists of the upper 2 floors of a 3 story home.
- Lower floor of this unit has a complete 1 bedroom unit with kitchen/dinning area and a full bath with washer/dryer.
- Upper floor of this unit has a large, open, 14'x30' north-facing studio, windows on 3 sides, a 10'x12' skylight in the middle of a vaulted ceiling. It also has a full bath, a 8'x10' roof terrace and a coffee bar with sink in the studio area.
This floor was conceived as a studio/office/professional-practice space and it can also be used as a separate studio work/living area. 

This unit has it's own entrance, own mail box and a reserved parking space. Cat and small dog are welcome subject to owner approval.

Owner is a retired architect who design and built this home for himself 8 years ago. He lives on the ground floor.

Monthly rent for this unit is $3,600 plus 50% of the shared utility costs (with owner), $250 per month. The utility package includes gas/electricity, water, waste collection and a high-end Comcast package. The package includes super fast internet connection with WIFI availability throughout the unit and its terrace, HD Cable TV and DVR.
Location of this home is at the center of Emeryville, Berkeley, Piedmont and Oakland. Water front and freeway access is multiple and immediate and it takes 20 minutes to meet for lunch at SFMOMA, or to leave your car at McArthur BART, hop on and . . .. . ...

listings.description:
Crockett is a safe, friendly, small town, with a well-established artist's community. Nestled in green hills on the banks of the Carquinez Straits you have easy access to I-80; non commute time it takes just 15 minutes to Berkeley or BART. Or catch the ferry in Vallejo to San Francisco, 5 minutes away over the Carquinez Bridge.

This one bedroom apartment (top left) has a wonderful water view; and is available now. It is one of three self-contained apartments in this genuine Cape Cod building with a private entrance via an external flight of stairs. Behind the building there's a large un-fenced garden available for tenants (if you love gardening, and want to grow your own veggies, this is the place for you)! 

The apartment has brand new carpet and freshly painted throughout. Natural gas heating and cooking. The bedroom looks out on the garden and has a small built in closet. The bathroom has a claw foot tub and shower combo. There's a small breakfast bar in the kitchen. The living room has full water view; a small storage room; and an alcove wired for internet, ideal for laptop home office set up. All this adds up to 650 sq. ft. of sunny space in total.

We are looking for a mature, long term tenant to make this home. Someone with good rental references. A non-smoker and pet free person who will fit in well with our existing tenants who are respectful professionals; responsible, quiet and easy going. 

Rent is $1,450 per month. Deposit is $1,450. Total move in cost is $2,900 (deposit and first month's rent). A non-refundable application processing fee of $35 is payable at the time of submitting your completed and signed application. We ask you to bring a CA ID and proof of income at this time also. 

Email Lindsay with your contact phone number for more details and arrange a viewing.

Welcome To Higby

Built In 2015.

A refined living experience in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley. With modern apartments and inviting common areas, Higby creates a place that is both home and a gathering space. Within walking distance to craft breweries, celebrated restaurants, organic markets and cultural highlights, Higby celebrated exploration and adventure. 

Higby offers studio, one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley

Modern building amenities include: 
•	Lobby with lounge seating and TV
•	Courtyard with a bocce ball court
•	Roof deck with a barbecue, fire pit, lounge seating and city views
•	Fitness studio
•	Indoor bike storage and work stand
•	Enclosed residential parking garage

Apartment units feature: 
•	Electric ovens
•	Gas range cooktops
•	Dishwashers
•	Washers and dryers

Higby is designed to operate 25% more efficiently than a code-compliant building. Sustainability highlights contributing to Higby's LEED Gold certification include:
•	Locally sourced and recycle content materials
•	Non-toxic finishes and a building-wide green cleaning program
•	Aggressive construction waste recycling program
•	Native, adaptive plantings to reduce water consumption
•	On-site planters to detain and manage storm water 

So Stretch out. Entertain. Sleep it off. Celebrate pajama day. Declare a lost weekend. Take a conference call from home. Do what you do. Live At Higby.

It is a back yard studio with a private entrance. The colors are a warm off-white cream with pinewood trim. The canopy covered outdoor patio, accessed through double French Doors, leads out into the sunny backyard, with citrus, peach, and plum trees as well as other green fauna and trees waiting to be planted. We are communal in that we share the backyard areas; good communication is a must, so friendliness and a sense of humor go a long way! 

Approximately 400 sq feet inside, there is a full sized kitchen that includes a gas stove, dishwasher, refrigerator, microwave, and lots of pantry and cabinet storage. The bathroom has a large shower stall and is fully tiled with a glass block window for plenty of natural light and privacy. The outside patio is tiled and adds an extra 130 sq feet of outdoor living ability.

SEMI-FURNISHED with a folding table attached to the wrap-around built-in bookshelves, a queen bed, a hand built redwood bed base with more under bed storage, a small dresser of drawers and a corner shower caddy. If you have a bunch of furniture, this won't work.

Located between the Redwood and Laurel districts, this is a quiet street with great neighbors. Even while having quick access to all freeways, easy shopping and restaurants, there is a lot of privacy in this situation and it is very quiet as far as any freeway noise. 

Just minutes away from the Diamond, Joaquin Miller and Redwood parks, and all the fabulous redwood trails therein, there is quick access to the Colleges of Merritt, Mills and Holy Names.

With a short walk to the 35th or MacArthur Avenues, there is a great commute to SF via express bus or carpool, or to catch the main AC bus lines to BART, San Francisco, Berkeley, or downtown Oakland. 

	Monthly rental fee is $1600, including utilities
(Rent includes these utilities: AT&T Internet, PG&E, EBMUD and WasteManagement) 
	MOVE IN is $3200 (first month's rent and 1/2 of Security Deposit).
	Total Security Deposit is $3200; 
(The second half of the Security Deposit can be paid in incremental amounts over time)
	References, Proof of Income and Credit Report required.
	No section eight	
	No smoking-No illicit drugs 
	No extra storage on the property 
	Street parking only

We want someone who is responsible and pays rent on time. Willingness to set up an electronic bank transfer is essential. Again; references, proof of 3 months of income and current credit report required. No prior evictions.

AVAILABLE April 1st, 2016 (possibly earlier)

PLEASE NOTE: The pictures here are not all correct as far as furniture (the chairs and the small orange couch..and the cat..are gone...and the outside patio is open now, and the yard is still in fluxuation). We are still processing and cleaning and preparing this unit, but the pictures give an approximate visual idea. Newer pictures will be re-posted as soon as I have them ready. 

If interested, contact me and tell me about yourself and what you are looking for. We can set up an appointment.
